DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study evaluate pharmacokinetic ( PK ) profile ibuprofen oral administration single dose MOMENT ACT ANALGESIC granules healthy male female subject , fast condition .
DOC.brief_title: Ibuprofen ( MOMENT ACT ANALGESIC Granules ) Pharmacokinetic Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . Informed consent : sign write informed consent inclusion study ; 2 . Sex age : female male , 1855 year old inclusive ; 3 . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) : 18.530 kg/m2 inclusive ; 4 . Vital sign : systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) 100139 mmHg , diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) 5089 mmHg , heart rate ( HR ) 5090 bpm , measure 5 min rest sit position ; 5 . Full comprehension : ability comprehend full nature purpose study , include possible risk side effect ; ability cooperate investigator comply requirement entire study ; 6 . Contraception fertility ( female ) : female childbearing potential must use least one follow reliable method contraception : 1. hormonal oral , implantable , transdermal , injectable contraceptive least 2 month screen visit ; 2. nonhormonal intrauterine device female condom spermicide contraceptive sponge spermicide diaphragm spermicide cervical cap spermicide least 2 month screen visit ; 3. male sexual partner agree use male condom spermicide ; 4. sterile sexual partner . Female participant nonchildbearing potential postmenopausal status least 1 year admit . For female subject , pregnancy test result must negative screen day 1 . 1 .
